Package com.hexaware.dao.serviceImpl

Class AdminServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.serviceImpl.AdminServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdminService
public class AdminServiceImpl extends Object implements IAdminService
Implementation of the IAdminService interface for managing admin operations in the database.
